Notes: A cloud platform that can be stood on using the Bee or Cloud power-ups. If the player does not have any of these two power-ups and steps on the platform, it will temporarily disappear. When Ground Pounded, it will temporarily disappear as well, no matter what power-up is currently active. The platform remains stationary or moves on a path.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the platform will move on its path while this switch is active.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
